property.name: text
property.value: delayOffset = 2, actuate before or at event timestamp

property.name: text
property.value: distributed SR app, 1 delay in each platform

property.name: text
property.value: distributed SR app, 2 delays in first platform

property.name: text
property.value: delayOffset = 2, actuate before or at event timestamp

property.name: text
property.value: Run SR in Ptides: Simple SR application with 2 delays. In Ptides, use delayOffset on SR composites to determine how much ahead of time the SR model can be. This value depends on the topology, delays and inputs. The SR model can be executed x time units into the future, if inputs during the next x time units do not influence outputs.

property.name: legend
property.value: source, sr, d0+a, d1+a, d1+na, dist1, dist2

entity.name: Ramp
entity.doc: Create a sequence of tokens with increasing value
